bill_title: authorize the county coroner to charge a fee for certain autopsy reports.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the county coroner to charge a fee for certain autopsy reports. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 23-14 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If any procurement organization or any other person requests a copy of an autopsy report, the coroner may charge a fee to compensate the coroner's office for the costs of preparing the autopsy report and making a copy. No fee may be charged to the state or any of its political subdivisions for requesting an autopsy report. The fee charged for each autopsy report shall be ascertained and approved by the board of county commissioners. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
